original_text:
Better is a poor person who walks in his integrity
    than one who is crooked in speech and is a fool.
korean_text: 가난하여도 성실하게 행하는 자는 입술이 패역하고 미련한 자보다 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Better is a poor person who walks in his integrity
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 정직함 속에서 행하는 가난한 사람이 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: than one who is crooked in speech
